name: Channeling Scourge

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Channel energy class feature, inquisitor level 1st.

sections.body: When you use channel energy to deal damage, your inquisitor levels count as cleric levels for determining the number of damage dice and the saving throw DC.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your zeal for hunting your faith's enemies empowers your ability to channel divine energy, as long as you channel that energy for harm.
